title.rendered: ZKTECO TF1700 ACCESS CONTROL & TIME ATTENDANCE SYSTEM

content.rendered:
ZKTeco TF1700 Access Control & Time Attendance System

The TF1700 is one of the world’s smallest Ethernet connection-based fingerprint terminals, used for access control and time attendance features, with IP65 waterproof housing.

  • IP65 WaterProof, 128×64 OLED
  • Fingerprint Capacity: 3,000
  • Card Capacity: 10,000
  • Record Capacity: 50,000
  • Authentication: Fingerprint, Pin, Card
  • Communication: TCIP/IP, RS485
  • Access Control Interface, for Electric Lock, Door Sensor, exit Button, Alarm, Door Bell, DC 12V/3A
